nl.helixsoft.param

Interface ParameterModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParameterModel, SimpleParameterModel

    public interface ParameterModel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ParameterModel.ParameterModelListener
      Classes implement this interface to signify that they are ready to listen to changes to a ParameterModel.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getNum

        int getNum()
        Returns:
        number of parameters in this model.

      • getMetaData

        java.lang.Object getMetaData(int i)
        Get meta data about a parameter.
        Parameters:
        i - index of parameter that is queried
        Returns:
        class of parameter i

        Possible return values:

        • File -> JTextField with JButton("Browse")
        • String -> JTextField
        • URL -> radiobutton file / url and JTextField + Browse button
        • Boolean -> checkbox
        • List or String[] -> combobox

      • getLabel

        java.lang.String getLabel(int i)
        Get a short label for a given parameter.
        Parameters:
        i - index of the parameter that is queried
        Returns:
        label for parameter i

      • getHint

        java.lang.String getHint(int i)
        Get a longer hint or description for a given parameter.
        Parameters:
        i - index of the parameter that is queried
        Returns:
        label for parameter i

      • setValue

        void setValue(int i,
            java.lang.Object val)
        Set a parameter value. Based on this action, other parameters may change. For example, if a URL parameter for a webservice is set, the webservice may be queried for the allowed range of values for a second dataset parameter.
        Parameters:
        i - index of the parameter
        val - new value for the parameter

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue(int i)
        Get the current value for a parameter. Will return a default value if none was set before.
        Parameters:
        i - index of the parameter
        Returns:
        current value of the parameter
